title: OWA
creator: Universidad Politécnica Salesiana - Ecuador
description: OWA is an evaluation tool that basically receives a request to analyze the content of a web page, through its URL, and then proceeds to verify compliance with WCAG techniques.  This functionality is also displayed through RESTFul API that return the result of the evaluation in JSON and XML formats
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
